title: Why a Northern Ireland Party Is a Major Hurdle to Johnson’s Brexit Deal
text:
LONDON—Northern Ireland’s Democratic Unionist Party helped sink Theresa May’s Brexit deal. It may sink Boris Johnson’s, too.

The leading role this small Northern Irish party is playing in the U.K.’s Brexit drama underscores how issues affecting the island of Ireland have repeatedly upset the country’s planned exit from the European Union. Prime Minister Johnson got European leaders’ backing for his deal on Thursday, but still needs Parliament to ratify his revised plan if the U.K. is to exit from the bloc by an Oct. 31 deadline.

...
description: Northern Ireland’s Democratic Unionist Party helped sink Theresa May’s Brexit deal. It may sink Boris Johnson’s, too.
